title: Two and a Half Man
description: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

title: Friends
description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six 20 to 30-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

title: Todo mundo odeia o Chris
description: A young African American teen attempts to survive with his dysfunctional family and his all white school in the 1980s.
